title: Talk about your first job
description: Share memories about your early career experiences, colleagues, and what you learned.

title: Describe your childhood home
description: Paint a picture of where you grew up, the rooms, the neighborhood, and special memories.

title: Share a family tradition
description: Tell us about a special tradition your family had and why it was meaningful.

title: Your most memorable vacation
description: Recall a trip that left a lasting impression and the adventures you had.

title: A person who influenced you
description: Describe someone who made a significant impact on your life and how they changed you.

title: Your wedding day
description: Share the joy, excitement, and special moments from one of life's biggest celebrations.

title: A challenge you overcame
description: Tell the story of a difficult time and how you found the strength to get through it.

title: Your proudest achievement
description: Reflect on an accomplishment that filled you with pride and satisfaction.

title: Tell me about your parents
description: Share memories of your mother and father, what they were like, and what you learned from them.

title: Your first day of school
description: Remember your very first day of school - how did you feel, what do you remember?

title: A favorite family meal
description: Describe a meal that brings back warm memories - who made it, when did you eat it?

title: Coming to America
description: Tell the story of how you came to this country - why you came, what it was like.

title: Your hometown in China
description: Paint a picture of the place you grew up - the streets, the people, the culture.

title: Learning English
description: Share your experience of learning English - the challenges, the breakthroughs.

title: First job in America
description: What was your first job when you arrived in America? What surprised you?

title: Cultural differences you noticed
description: What surprised you most about American culture compared to Chinese culture?

title: Traditional Chinese holidays
description: Tell me about how you celebrated Spring Festival, Mid-Autumn Festival, or other holidays growing up.

title: Your grandparents' stories
description: What stories did your grandparents tell you about their lives?

title: Life during difficult times
description: Share memories of living through challenging historical periods.

title: Your favorite childhood game
description: What games did you play as a child? Who did you play with?

title: First time seeing snow
description: If you grew up in southern China, what was it like to see snow for the first time?

title: Your first car
description: Tell the story of your first car - how you got it, where you drove it.

title: Learning to cook
description: Who taught you to cook? What was the first dish you mastered?

title: Your first apartment
description: Describe your first place living on your own - what was it like?

title: Meeting your spouse
description: How did you meet your husband or wife? What attracted you to them?

title: Your proposal story
description: How did you or your spouse propose? What made it special?

title: Raising children
description: What was the hardest and best part of raising your kids?

title: Your children's childhood
description: Share a favorite memory from when your kids were young.

title: Family celebrations
description: What's your favorite family celebration or gathering you remember?

title: Sunday dinners
description: Tell me about family dinners growing up - who was there, what did you eat?

title: Your mother's wisdom
description: What's the best advice your mother gave you?

title: Your father's lessons
description: What important life lessons did your father teach you?

title: A time you helped someone
description: Tell about a time you helped someone in need - what happened?

title: A time someone helped you
description: Share a memory of when someone's kindness made a difference in your life.

title: Your first boss
description: What was your first boss like? What did you learn from them?

title: Career turning point
description: Describe a moment that changed the direction of your career.

title: Work you're proud of
description: What work achievement are you most proud of?

title: Retirement transition
description: What was it like to retire? How did you adjust?

title: Favorite hobby
description: Tell me about a hobby that brings you joy - how did you start it?

title: A book that changed you
description: Is there a book that had a big impact on your life? Why?

title: Music you love
description: What music do you love? What memories does it bring back?

title: Dancing memories
description: Do you remember learning to dance or dancing at special occasions?

title: Fashion through the years
description: How has fashion changed since you were young? What did you wear?

title: Technology changes
description: What technology change has amazed you most in your lifetime?

title: Writing letters
description: Do you remember writing letters before phones? Who did you write to?

title: Black and white TV
description: What do you remember about early television? What shows did you watch?

title: Going to the movies
description: Share memories of going to movie theaters when you were young.

title: Your school days
description: What was school like when you were growing up?

title: Favorite teacher
description: Who was your favorite teacher and why?

title: School friends
description: Tell me about your closest friends from school days.

title: After school activities
description: What did you do after school? Any clubs or activities?

title: Summer vacations
description: What did you do during summer break as a kid?

title: Favorite subject
description: What was your favorite subject in school and why?
